name: shiori
description: Shiori is a self-hosted bookmark manager inspired by Pocket. It can be used via CLI or web UI, saving pages, snapshots, and tags while providing import/export features.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Save web pages with titles, descriptions, and tags for organization

features.title: Offline Mode
features.description: Creates offline snapshots of bookmarked pages for permanent access

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Finds bookmarks by searching titles, content, tags, or URLs

features.title: Tag Organization
features.description: Categorizes bookmarks with multiple tags for flexible filtering

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Manage bookmarks via command line or modern web interface

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Migrates bookmarks from browsers using standard HTML format

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Stores all data in a single SQLite database file for easy backup
